cast.overview: The Nazis, exasperated at the number of escapes from their prison camps by a relatively small number of Allied prisoners, relocate them to a high-security 'escape-proof' camp to sit out the remainder of the war. Undaunted, the prisoners plan one of the most ambitious escape attempts of World War II. Based on a true story.
cast.title: The Great Escape

details.biography: Hans Reiser (3 June 1919 – 10 June 1992) was a German film and television actor. He starred as Joseph Schmidt in the 1958 biopic A Song Goes Round the World, and The Great Escape (film) as Herr Kuhn. Reiser was born and died in Munich. From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
details.name: Hans Reiser
